title: The Visitor

fields.name: Diverse Skillset (Passive):
fields.value: At the beginning of the game, you gain access to four random abilities: one from a Protective role, one from a Killing role, one from a Support role, and one from a completely random role. These will never be locked abilities.

fields.name: Mysterious Motives (Passive):
fields.value: You are publicly revealed at the start of the game. Your goal is randomized between Town, Evil faction, Neutral Killing, and Survival.

fields.name: The Friend (Passive):
fields.value: If the **Advisor** is present in the game, you are Town-aligned, and you die before them, they will gain one of your abilities at random.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win with whichever team you were randomized to!
